title: Am I the only one that feels the nautilus nerf does absolutely nothing?
body:
A reduction of 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 on nauts AOE really doesn't do much as a nerf as the damage from his slow was not why you played nautilus.  Maybe maxing shield now will compensate from that slight nerf do his E damage?

Nautilus
•Riptide (E) damage lowered to 55/85/115/145/175 from 60/95/130/165/200
